results.title: Biden’s China Tariffs Are the End of an Era for Cheap Chinese Goods
results.abstract: The president’s move to protect strategic manufacturing sectors from low-cost competition aims to increase jobs, but consumers might not like the costs.

results.title: In His Beloved Philadelphia, Biden Faces Wariness From Black Voters
results.abstract: Even in the president’s favorite political stomping ground, his standing has slipped with Democrats who will be vital to a repeat victory, interviews with nearly two dozen Black voters showed.
results.byline: By Maya King and Katie Glueck

multimedia.caption: Black voters were crucial to President Biden’s winning 2020 coalition, but they, like other groups of Democrats, have appeared less energized so far in 2024.

results.title: Russians Poured Over Ukraine’s Border. There Was Little to Stop Them.
results.abstract: The stunning incursion into the Kharkiv Region lays bare the challenges facing Ukraine’s weary and thinly stretched forces as Russia ramps up its summer offensive.
